name: eceq1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

comment: Equality theorem for ` C ` -coset of ` A ` and ` C ` -coset of ` B ` , inference version. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 11-May-2021.)
